EST

description.en: Organic chemistry concepts course, providing overview of structure, nomenclature and reactivity of organic compounds.
description.et: Orgaanilise keema üldkursus, kus antakse ülevaade orgaaniliste ühendite ehitusest, nomenklatuurist ja reaktsioonovõimest

objectives.en: The main goal of this course is to introduce general concepts of organic chemistry and demonstrate their interrelationship with other fields of chemistry and physical sciences in general. More specifically the course covers the following aspects organic chemistry:
objectives.et: Kursuse peamiseks eesmärgiks on tutvustada orgaanilise keemia põhitõdesid ning näidata nende haakumist teiste keemia harudega ning füüsikaliste loodusteadustega üldiselt. Täpsemalt katab see kursus järgmisi organilise keemia aspekte:

objectives.en: - Principles of structure of organic molecules and its relationship to physical and chemical properties of organic compounds,
objectives.et: - Orgaaniliste ühendite struktuur ja selle seosed ainete füüsikaliste ja keemiliste omadustega,

objectives.en: - The concept of functional groups as basis of classification of organic compounds and characterization of their reactivity,
objectives.et: - Funktsionaalsed rühmad kui organiliste ühendite klassifikatsiooni alus ja nende reaktsioonivõime selgitus,

objectives.en: - Interrelationships between chemical structure and chemical properties of organic molecules.
objectives.et: - Seosed orgaaniliste ühendite  struktuuri ja nende keemiliste omaduste vahel,

objectives.en: - Interrelationships between structure and biological functions of biomolecules.
objectives.et: - Seosed biomolekulide struktuuri ja nende bioloogiliste funktsioonide vahel.

learning_outcomes.en: The student who has passed the course should be able:
- to describe structure and shape of organic molecules, properties of chemical bonds, forces between molecules and their role in governing physical properties of organic compounds,
learning_outcomes.et: - kirjeldama orgaaniliste molekulide struktuuri ja ruumilist ehitust ning neis ühendites olevate keemiliste sidemete omadusi, iseloomustama  molekulide vastastikmõjusid ja nende osa aine füüsikaliste omaduste määramisel,

learning_outcomes.en: - to identify functional classes of organic molecules and know principles of their naming,
learning_outcomes.et: - määrama orgaanilise ühendi kuuluvust aineklassi ja oskama ühendit nimetada,

learning_outcomes.en: - to understand why and how organic reactions occur,
learning_outcomes.et: - mõistma põhjuseid, miks on võimalikud keemilised reaktsioonid ning selgitama nende toimumise üldiseid põhimõtteid,

learning_outcomes.en: - to describe behaviour of acids and bases and explain acidity and basicity of  functional groups,
learning_outcomes.et: - selgitama ühendite käitumist happe ja alusena ning seostama happelisust ja aluselisust funktsionaalsete rühmade ehitusega,

learning_outcomes.en: - to describe main interconversions of functional groups and explain mechanism of these reactions,
learning_outcomes.et: - kirjelduma funktsionaalsete rühmade peamisi üleminekureaktsioone ja siduma neid tähtsamate reaktsioonimehhanismidega,

learning_outcomes.en: - to identify main classes of biomolecules and understand interrelationships between their structure  and functions.
learning_outcomes.et: - tundma peamisi biomolekulide klasse ning mõistma, kuidas on nende molekulide bioaktiivsus seotud nende struktuuriga.

notes.et: rehearsal tests and one rehearsal exam are made during the lecture course

independent_work.et:
1. Reading textbook and solving problems, as requested in lecture notes
2. Three tests to be completed at home. The tests will be handed in during the lectures. The  tests submitted on time add 3%  to the final score of the written exam

description.et: Written exam at the end of the course. Marks A, B, C, D, E, F

grade_evaluation.et: Written exam, 51% of the maximal credits for positive result

debt_elimination.et: additional exam date is fixed in exam time schedule

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

resources.mandatory_materials: Roos, G., Roos, C.,  Organic Chemistry Concepts. An EFL Approach.  Academic Press/Elsevier, 221p, 2015, ISBN978-0-12-801699-2
resources.recommended_materials:
Additional tools:
Jones, Jr. M., Fleming, S.A., Organics Chemistry, W.W. Norton & Company, 4th Ed, 1220 p, 2010; 5th Ed, 2014; 
StudySpace, free and open web-site with molecular models and short write-ups at:  www.wwnorton.com/studyplace
SmartWork: an online tutorial and homework program for organic chemistry at: www.wwnorton.com/smartwork

description.et: 16. Summary of transitions between organic compounds
